alert.note: Alert for Beaufort; East Carteret; Pamlico; Southern Craven; West Carteret (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 06 at 4:04AM EDT by NWS Newport/Morehead City
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Craven, southeastern Beaufort, Carteret and Pamlico Counties through 500 AM EDT... At 404 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Peletier to near Cape Lookout Lighthouse. Movement was northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... New Bern, Havelock, Morehead City, Newport, Cedar Island, Harkers Island, Stella, South River, Cape Carteret, North River, Davis, Straits, Atlantic, Sealevel, Marshallberg, Smyrna, Merrimon, Pine Knoll Shores, Harlowe and Lowland. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Beaufort; East Carteret; Pamlico; Southern Craven; West Carteret
